attributes.action: Hold a public inquiry into the abuse of young girls by grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: We must - for the sake of every citizen in the country - understand, expose and hold accountable those who have destroyed young lives, including those who have colluded with the perpetrators. Young girls who have, for so long, been denied justice need to see justice.  This is the only way to ensure such horrors are stopped. They must not continue to be 'swept under the carpet'.
attributes.background: The National Inquiry should include  the cover up by those in positions of authority who are charged with protecting these young girls.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
